headline: A Look At Royal Caribbean Cruises (RCL) Valuation As New Ships And Mexico Investments Take Shape
summary: Royal Caribbean Cruises (RCL) is back in focus after outlining plans for new Discovery Class ships, continued capital returns, and fresh sustainability and infrastructure investments in Mexico, alongside a recent board appointment in clean energy and safety. See our latest analysis for Royal Caribbean Cruises. Despite a 3.95% 1 day share price decline to US$302.64 and some pressure from higher fuel costs and insider selling, Royal Caribbean Cruises still has a 30 day share price return of...
